version_description:
- added new localizations (nb, fr, it, hu, ar, bg, et, zh-Hant-TW)
- fixed few small issues
- fixed time issue
Completely new version that contains 100% of www.windy.tv functionality, including favs synchronization, meteograms and 28 weather layers. But not only that, new version works also on iPad.

- Faster loading on start-up (~20%)
- New weather layers for pilots: Freezing levels, cloud tops
- Favourites now display metars in RAW mode (if used on airport page before) 
- Beautifull temperature graph is now used on startup, favs and basic spot forecast 
- Fixed bug: Favs are sorted alphabetically 
- NAM model upgraded to 3km resolution

- "Airgrams", new spot forecasts for pilots and paragliders
- Registration of the new user within app improved
- Significant performance improvement when displaying spot forecast or meteogram
- Each webcam now provides player with last 24hours
- As we have promised, meteogram is now part of airport detail

- New map of air quality, including 72h forecast. Worldwide SO2, CO and dust levels 
- Airport NOTAMs can be displayed in raw mode 
- Important bug fix (erratic behavior of detail/meteogram/airgram switch)
- What was new in prev version: Map of kiting spots, new name Windy
Windy Alerts are here! Define your desired wind, waves or even fresh snow conditions for any place in the world and you will never miss your BIG day.
New User Interface, more swipe gestures

Christmas came early this year. Windy 11.20 brings you:
- Major bug fixes 
- Borders and retina labels for better orientation in the map
- Better overlay colors

- Weather radar covering USA, Puerto Rico, Guam and South Korea.
- Pressure isolines
- Spot forecast is now sync'd with the map

- Performance improvement when scrolling detailed forecast
- Long tap on map for new context menu
- New webcams viewer
- Distance & measurement capability
New user interface
- Weather Picker is back. Just single tap on map.

- New wave forecast featuring waves-radar
- Improved meteogram

- Meteogram now contains pressure and dew point
- Weather picker stays in place during zoom
- Wind & wave directions can be displayed as text or number
- "Find my location" now creates blue point on map

- Detailed ICON-EU 7km forecast model
- Rain, snow accumulations also for other models
- Pressure isolines are now 100x faster
- Faster start-up of app

- Completely new sharper map
- Better colors for weather layers
- Each city on a map now contains forecasted temperature
- Faster startup and much less data transfer than a prev. version
- New weather layers: Precipitation type, fog, thunderstorms (experimental)
- iPhone X support
Tide forecast!!!

- Webcams are now much faster and contain timelapse for the past 24 hours.
- We were not able to fix with crashing Airgram, we have reported it as iOS 11.3.1 WebKit issue. We created a hot-fix which prevents the app from falling into the loop. It also crashes on mobile Safari. The Windy code was running without any issues for more than two years.

- New weather Radar in Europe, Japan and Taiwan. We are working hard to add more countries to our global radar coverage.
- Enjoy and please rate our app

- New icon to access main Windy menu, just where your thumbnail expects it
- Bug fixes and optimizations

Thunderstorm forecast: Windy is the first iOS app presenting truly global and very accurate THUNDERSTORM FORECAST from ECMWF. Early reviews have shown, that new thunderstorm forecast is so accurate, that it changes level of safety Windy.com users can have.

- Spot forecast now contains "Wind" view, for kiters, sailors and other Wind seekers. Compare all available forecast model for particular place, with easy to use wind rose on the map.
- To better track the hurricanes we have also added "windAccumulation" layer.

- Completely new WIND VIEW for any location in the world
- Finally WIDGET is here
- Map labels are now localized to your language, and they load faster

- New donations page. Please donate as in-app purchase to keep us going
- New Sounding Forecast (long tap on map to activate it)
- Much more improved fog forecast
- New Weather Warnings published by official weather institutions (so called CAP Alerts)
- Fixed Celsious/Fahrenheit issue on Widget (at least we hope so)
- Fixed iPhone XR,XS,X Max display

- New donations page. Please donate as in-app purchase to keep us going
- New Sounding Forecast (long tap on map to activate it)
- Much more improved fog forecast
- New Weather Warnings published by official weather institutions (so called CAP Alerts)
- Fixed Celsious/Fahrenheit issue on Widget (at least we hope so)
- Fixed iPhone XR,XS,X Max display

- New: "Observation vs. Forecast". Compare observed values with forecasted ones.
- New: Model AROME 1.3km in central Europe
- Many fixes and optimizations

- Air quality forecast: NO2, Aerosol, PM2, Ozone
- Experimental layer "Outdoor map" with picker resolving approximate elevation. How do you like it?
New Extreme forecast:  Windy now forecasts extreme rain, wind or temperature 7 days ahead. Protect your live or property by using Windy.com.

- Some parts of the aps were rafactored to be much more faster
- Weather station graph display measured rain (if provided)
- Broken context menu on long tap was fixed on iOS 13
- Any website links to www.windy.com now open Windy App with particular page (Universal Links)

• The problems connected with the introduction of iOS 13 are now fixed, specifically the double tap and long touch
• Various UI, stability and performance improvements
